name: Ping Pong Rush
description:
Touch to move the racket around and shoot as many balls as you can. But beware you have only 3 lives and the ball speed increases with time. Be quick!

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive table tennis game.

Suitable for all ages and enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
